`,(0,a.jsx)(n.p,{children:"It's been just over six months since the Tamagui beta and almost a year since alpha. While the beta was a huge amount of work, getting to 1.0 has been even more. There's so much to cover."}),`
`,(0,a.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["For this release, I'll be splitting the release post into sections - ",(0,a.jsx)(n.code,{children:"core"})," (the style system), ",(0,a.jsx)(n.code,{children:"static"})," (the optimizing compiler), and ",(0,a.jsx)(n.code,{children:"tamagui"})," (the UI kit)."]}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(n.h2,{id:"whats-new-in-core",children:"What's new in Core"}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(n.p,{children:"It's all about maturity. Core has had over 500 bugs fixed, landed large performance and memory improvements, and brings compatibility with the latest and greatest in React and React Native."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(n.h3,{id:"react-069-react-18-react-native-web-18",children:"React 0.69, React 18, React Native Web 18"}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(n.p,{children:"Across all of Tamagui, we've bumped support to the latest versions. Due to improvements in react-native-web 18, we were also able to dramatically simplify setup, no longer having to patch the library to support classnames."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(n.h3,{id:"making-web-only-use-cases-shine",children:"Making web-only use cases shine"}),`
`,(0,a.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["Core is an incredibly powerful CSS-in-JS library for React, and the only one that has an optimizing compiler that makes your apps faster. `,(0,a.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`

`,(0,a.jsx)(n.li,{children:"You're doing the above, but planning to build a Native app in the future."}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(n.li,{children:"You're using Tamagui to target Native and Web, but want to build one-off pages that are web-only while still sharing your typed design system and various Tamagui components."}),`

`,(0,a.jsx)(n.h3,{id:"bundle-size-reduction",children:"Bundle size reduction"}),`
`,(0,a.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["De-coupling core from ",(0,a.jsx)(n.code,{children:"react-native"})," is a big win for web-only use cases. Even beyond that, we've shaved nearly ~12Kb from core through many optimizations all over."]}),`
`,(0,a.jsx)(n.p,{children:"But we've also set up core to go much futher in size savings."}),`
`,(0,a.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["As of today, core is about 18Kb with GZIP. `,(0,a.jsxs)(n.p,{children:["Going forward, there's a direct path to make core even better for web-only use cases. Directly, we can likely get another 5Kb saved through hand-optimization. `,(0,a.jsx)(n.h3,{id:"large-performance-improvements",children:"Large performance improvements"}),`
